basicInfo.name: Yu Shin
basicInfo.flavor: Living in the mountains, Yu Shin abandoned all worldly things and became an enlightened sage.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Effect Resist Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Effect Resist Reduction to 16%.

Skill 1.name: Thunder Wolf
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 40% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 92% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - 3 Allies
 - Adds Effect: 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Skill 2.name: Lightning Strike
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 135% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Paralysis chance becomes 55%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Incoming Healing Reduction to 75%.

Passive.name: Sage's Teachings
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Turns: All Damage Immunity duration becomes 3 turn(s).
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 34%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Yeonhee, Karma, Li, peach wine, order, kind heartedness
profile.dislikes: Karma, Sun Wukong, evil will, smoked meat
profile.story: Living in the mountains, Yu Shin abandoned all worldly things and became an enlightened sage.

basicInfo.name: Yu Shin
basicInfo.flavor: Upon hearing news of a crisis, Yu Shin returned home and saved his nation from disaster. Despite his heroism, the people could not forgive his past actions, so he withdrew once more to the mountains.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Effect Resist Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Thunder Wolf
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 72% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 40% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 72% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Lightning Strike
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 105% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 105% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Incoming Healing Reduction to 36%.

Passive.name: Sage's Teachings
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]

basicInfo.name: Yu Shin
basicInfo.flavor: Yu Shin was the leader of the Hwarang. He led the Hwarang army into battle, but he was dismissed from his post after a loss and went to live in the mountains.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Effect Resist Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 62% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Lightning Strike
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Incoming Healing Reduction to 28%.

Passive.name: Sage's Teachings
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
